Title: Re-Usable Button Control for TFS Work Item Definitions
Description: Provides a button control for use in TFS work item tracking.
HomeWiki:
Button Control for TFS Work Item Tracking

Provides a button control for use in TFS work item tracking.

Overview

This project provides a re-usable button control that can be included in your TFS work item type definitions.

Examples of where you might use the control:
  • Invoke a web service that retrieves some data needed by the work item
  • Launch some custom UI to interact with TFS or perform other tasks (e.g. the screen shot below shows custom UI that is launched by the button to create a linked code review work item and corresponding shelveset for a bug).



Please see http://blogs.msdn.com/b/jschaffe/archive/2012/05/04/a-re-usable-button-control-for-tfs-work-item-definitions.aspx for additional information.
